name: cute-cards-modal
description: Modular choice modal for Cute Cards Shopify theme

scripts.deploy: npm run build && shopify theme push --theme 190802035018 --only assets/cc-choice.js --only assets/cc-choice.css --allow-live
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && shopify theme push --theme 190802035018 --only assets/cc-choice.js --only assets/cc-choice.css
